alert.note: Alert for Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:03PM EDT until July 13 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR RUTLAND AND WESTERN WINDSOR COUNTIES... At 703 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Rutland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Castleton, Killington, Rutland City, Middletown Springs, Wallingford, Mt. Holly, Mt. Tabor, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Poultney, Chittenden, Clarendon, West Rutland, Ira, Wells, West Castleton, Pawlet, Mount Holly, Hubbardton, and Poultney Village. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
